meeting_info.type: Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee Meeting
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, TX and via video conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the June 25, 2024, Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Public Art Program
agenda_items.description: Briefing on the Dallas Public Art Program.

agenda_items.title: Review of Storm Debris Collections and Resident Communications for Sanitation Services
agenda_items.description: Discussion on storm debris collections and communication strategies.

agenda_items.title: Consider amending the one-year limitation on subsequent representation by former councilmembers
agenda_items.description: Discussion on potential amendments to representation limitations.

agenda_items.title: City Facilities Partners Update - Dallas Black Dance Theater
agenda_items.description: Update on partnerships with the Dallas Black Dance Theater.

agenda_items.title: Bloomberg Center for Public Innovation Love Your Block Program Grant Recipient
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the grant recipient for the Love Your Block Program.

agenda_items.title: FY25 Year One Objectives for Library Strategic Plan
agenda_items.description: Presentation of objectives for the library's strategic plan.

agenda_items.title: Proposed closure of the Skillman Southwestern Branch Library
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the proposed closure of a library branch.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Office of Procurement Services Item for Office of Community Care
agenda_items.description: Discussion on a contract with Guidehouse, Inc. for a Senior Services Strategic Plan.

agenda_items.title: Legislative Priorities
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the legislative priorities for the upcoming period.

agenda_items.title: Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee Forecast
agenda_items.description: Forecast for the Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee.
